flavor: You seek out specific threats to the natural order, and when you find them, you eliminate them. Finding the threat can be a long and arduous hunt, but you enjoy the chase and savor spending long periods of time tailing your chosen prey. Though any creature can choose to give up its place within natureâ€™s hierarchy and become your quarry, aberrations are immediately and always on your list of creatures to hunt down and kill.
name: Wilden - Hunter
